meanings.definition: The sound made by a pig.
meanings.sent1: The farm was filled with the joyful oinks of the pigs.
meanings.sent2: I heard the oinks coming from the pigpen.
meanings.sent3: The oinks of the piglets always made the farmer smile.
meanings.sent4: The oinks of the pig sounded like music to my ears.
meanings.sent5: The loud oinks echoed through the barn.

meanings.definition: To make the sound of a pig.
meanings.sent1: The little pig oinks happily when it sees food.
meanings.sent2: She oinks playfully to imitate the pig's sound.
meanings.sent3: He oinks whenever he is excited about something.
meanings.sent4: The piglet oinks softly as it explores the farm.
meanings.sent5: The pig oinks loudly to get attention.

meanings.sent1: The oinks of the piglets were adorable.
meanings.sent2: The farmer recognized the oinks of his favorite pig.
meanings.sent3: The oinks of the pig could be heard from afar.
meanings.sent4: The oinks of the pig signaled feeding time.
meanings.sent5: The oinks of the pig pierced the quiet morning.
